title: Nets Owner Joe Tsai Is Scrambling to Help Resolve NBA Dispute With China
text:
Last month, the National Basketball Association approved the sale of the Brooklyn Nets to the Taiwan-born, American-educated businessman Joe Tsai. Now, just a few weeks later, he is in Shanghai scrambling to ensure the Nets’ first high-profile game in his tenure gets played.

The Nets’ exhibition against the Los Angeles Lakers, scheduled to be played in Shanghai Thursday, is possible collateral damage in the clash Mr. Tsai has been tasked with helping resolve. Mr. Tsai said in an interview that the NBA called him last weekend...
description: Nets owner Joe Tsai has been tasked with helping resolve the NBA’s ongoing dispute with China.
